comments.body:
How would I improve the type of `filter` so that the explicit type argument is not necessary?

```suggestion
    const multipleTypeGuarded: clownface.AnyPointer<NamedNode | BlankNode, Dataset> = anyPointer.filter(onlyNamedOrBlank);
```

Preferably also by allowing the type guard as `ptr is clownface.GraphPointer<NamedNode | BlankNode>`
I'd recommend asking in the TypeScript Community Discord
